name: @jabba01/tuba-backend-monorepo
description: Monorepo for the TUBA backend development framework
author: Jabba Ã¸1 (@ja88a)

scripts.repo:init: corepack enable && pnpm i && husky install && turbo telemetry disable && turbo repo:init --log-order stream && pnpm build
scripts.clean: turbo clean && pnpm turbo:stop && shx rm -rf .turbo dist node_modules out
scripts.precommit: pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm lint && pnpm format && pnpm build
scripts.start: pnpm build && cd apps/tuba-server-aio && pnpm start && cd -
scripts.db:init:local: pnpm db:start:local && pnpm db:create:local && pnpm db:migrate:local
scripts.docker:build:ci: docker build -t ${DOCKER_IMG_NAME}:${DOCKER_IMG_TAG} --build-arg GITHUB_TOKEN=${GITHUB_TOKEN} --build-arg PROJECT_PACKAGE=${PROJECT_PACKAGE} --build-arg PROJECT_PATH=${PROJECT_PATH} --build-arg PORT=${PORT} .
scripts.docker:build:server: docker build -t tuba-server-aio:latest --build-arg GITHUB_TOKEN=${GITHUB_TOKEN} --build-arg PROJECT_PACKAGE=@jabba01/tuba-server-aio --build-arg PROJECT_PATH=apps/tuba-server-aio --build-arg PORT=3000 .
scripts.docker:up:rebuild: pnpm i && dotenv -e ./.env.local -- docker compose up --force-recreate --build --remove-orphans -d && pnpm sleep1s && pnpm db:migrate:local
